case.title: russian looking for serious only - 31
case.text: Seeking a real, drama free relationship with a swm 35-45 yo. Please be settled, serious, sincere about creating ltr. Pls provide some basic info in your initial reply, as emails containing the only word "hi!!" or a pic of nudity, will be ignored. Game players please ignore this post. No smoking/drinking/drugs. I'm Russian, 31, simple and down to earth. I'm single, no kids, live in Brooklyn. Thanks.
